mapper.update: UPDATE ${project_name} SET ethnicity = ( CASE admissions.ethnicity WHEN 'UNKNOWN/NOT SPECIFIED' THEN 0 WHEN 'BLACK/HAITIAN' THEN 1 WHEN 'BLACK/AFRICAN AMERICAN' THEN 2 WHEN 'ASIAN - ASIAN INDIAN' THEN 3 WHEN 'WHITE - RUSSIAN' THEN 4 WHEN 'ASIAN - OTHER' THEN 5 WHEN 'HISPANIC/LATINO - DOMINICAN' THEN 6 WHEN 'WHITE - OTHER EUROPEAN' THEN 7 WHEN 'HISPANIC/LATINO - GUATEMALAN' THEN 8 WHEN 'ASIAN - CHINESE' THEN 9 WHEN 'BLACK/AFRICAN' THEN 10 WHEN 'WHITE' THEN 11 WHEN 'HISPANIC/LATINO - HONDURAN' THEN 12 WHEN 'UNABLE TO OBTAIN' THEN 13 WHEN 'HISPANIC OR LATINO' THEN 14 WHEN 'ASIAN - CAMBODIAN' THEN 15 WHEN 'MIDDLE EASTERN' THEN 16 WHEN 'HISPANIC/LATINO - PUERTO RICAN' THEN 17 WHEN 'ASIAN' THEN 18 WHEN 'AMERICAN INDIAN/ALASKA NATIVE' THEN 19 WHEN 'PATIENT DECLINED TO ANSWER' THEN 20 WHEN 'ASIAN - VIETNAMESE' THEN 21 WHEN 'HISPANIC/LATINO - SALVADORAN' THEN 22 WHEN 'PORTUGUESE' THEN 23 WHEN 'MULTI RACE ETHNICITY' THEN 24 WHEN 'BLACK/CAPE VERDEAN' THEN 25 WHEN 'OTHER' THEN 26 WHEN 'ASIAN - FILIPINO' THEN 27 WHEN 'WHITE - EASTERN EUROPEAN' THEN 28 WHEN 'WHITE - BRAZILIAN' THEN 29 WHEN 'NATIVE HAWAIIAN OR OTHER PACIFIC ISLANDER' THEN 30 END ) FROM admissions WHERE admissions.hadm_id = ${project_name}.hadm_id;

UPDATE ${project_name} SET ethnicity = ( CASE WHEN ad.ethnicity = 'UNKNOWN/NOT SPECIFIED' OR ad.ethnicity = 'UNABLE TO OBTAIN' OR ad.ethnicity = 'PATIENT DECLINED TO ANSWER' THEN 1 WHEN ad.ethnicity ILIKE '%BLACK%' THEN 2 WHEN ad.ethnicity ILIKE '%ASIAN%' THEN 3 WHEN ad.ethnicity ILIKE '%WHITE%' THEN 4 WHEN ad.ethnicity ILIKE '%HISPANIC/LATINO%' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END ) FROM admissions AS ad WHERE ad.hadm_id = ${project_name}.hadm_id;
UPDATE ${project_name} SET hospital_expire_flag = admissions.hospital_expire_flag FROM admissions WHERE admissions.hadm_id = ${project_name}.hadm_id;
UPDATE ${project_name} SET ${field_name} = elixhauser_ahrq.${field_name} FROM elixhauser_ahrq WHERE ${project_name}.hadm_id = elixhauser_ahrq.hadm_id
